languages.text: "Культисты вошли в контакт с вашими тайными ремесленниками, что трудятся в запретных цехах. Глупцы надеются, что они предадут Вашу Светлость и присоединятся к атаке. Мы могли бы использовать это заблуждение в своих целях... Если, конечно, наш враг и впрямь заблуждается".

"The cultists have contacted your secret artisans who toil in the forbidden workshops. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join in the attack. We could use their delusions to our advantage... If our enemy truly is mistaken, that is."
languages.original_text: "Культисты вошли в контакт с вашими тайными ремесленниками, что трудятся в запретных цехах. Глупцы надеются, что они предадут Вашу Светлость и присоединятся к атаке. Мы могли бы использовать это заблуждение в своих целях... Если, конечно, наш враг и впрямь заблуждается".

traits.locale_text: "The Cultists have contacted your secret artisans that work in the forbidden guilds. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join them for the attack. We could use this delusion to our advantage... If our enemy is truly wrong, that is."

"The Cultists have contacted your secret artisans that work in the forbidden guilds. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join them for the attack. We could use this delusion to our advantage... If our enemy is truly wrong, that is."

"The cultists have contacted your secret artisans who toil in the forbidden workshops. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join in the attack. We could use their delusions to our advantage... If our enemy truly is mistaken, that is."

"The cultists have contacted your secret artisans who toil in the forbidden workshops. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join in the attack. We could use their delusions to our advantage... If our enemy truly is mistaken, that is."

languages.text: “那些邪教徒联系了您在禁忌车间里工作的秘密工匠师。那群蠢货认为他们会背叛您，加入这场袭击，我们可以将计就计……当然，前提是，我们的敌人真的想错了。”
languages.original_text: "The cultists have contacted your secret artisans who toil in the forbidden workshops. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join in the attack. We could use their delusions to our advantage... If our enemy truly is mistaken, that is."

traits.locale_text: “那些邪教徒联系了您在禁忌车间里工作的秘密工匠师。那群蠢货认为他们会背叛您，加入这场袭击，我们可以将计就计……当然，前提是，我们的敌人真的想错了。”
“那些邪教徒联系了您在禁忌车间里工作的秘密工匠师。那群蠢货认为他们会背叛您，加入这场袭击，我们可以将计就计……当然，前提是，我们的敌人真的猜错了。”

languages.text: «Los cultistas han contactado con sus artesanos secretos de los talleres prohibidos. Los necios esperan que {mf|le|la} traicionen y se unan al ataque. Podríamos usar sus falsas esperanzas a nuestro favor... si nuestro enemigo está realmente equivocado, claro».
languages.original_text: "The cultists have contacted your secret artisans who toil in the forbidden workshops. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join in the attack. We could use their delusions to our advantage... If our enemy truly is mistaken, that is."

traits.locale_text: «Los cultistas han contactado con sus artesanos secretos de los talleres prohibidos. Los necios esperan que {mf|le|la} traicionen y se unan al ataque. Podríamos usar sus falsas esperanzas a nuestro favor... si nuestro enemigo está realmente equivocado, claro».

languages.text: 「禁断の工房で働く秘密の職工たちに、カルトが接触してきました。愚か者の奴らは、彼らが陛下を裏切り、攻撃に加わることを望んでいます。奴らの妄想を我々に有利になるよう利用出来そうだ...敵が本当に間違っているのであれば、うまくいくはずだ」
languages.original_text: "The cultists have contacted your secret artisans who toil in the forbidden workshops. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join in the attack. We could use their delusions to our advantage... If our enemy truly is mistaken, that is."

traits.locale_text: 「禁断の工房で働く秘密の職工たちに、魔女団が接触してきました。愚か者の奴らは、彼らが陛下を裏切り、攻撃に加わることを望んでいます。奴らの妄想を我々に有利になるよう利用出来そうだ...敵が本当に間違っているのであれば、うまくいくはずだ」
「禁断の工房で働く秘密の職工たちに、魔女団が接触してきました。愚か者の奴らは、彼らが陛下を裏切り、攻撃に加わることを望んでいます。奴らの妄想を我々に有利になるよう利用出来そうだ...敵が本当に間違っているのであれば、うまくいくはずだ」

languages.text: « Les cultistes ont contacté les artisans secrets qui œuvrent dans les ateliers interdits. Ces imbéciles espèrent qu'ils trahiront Votre Seigneurie et se joindront à eux lors de l'attaque. Nous pourrions exploiter leurs illusions délirantes à notre avantage... Si l'ennemi se trompe bel et bien, j'entends. »
languages.original_text: "The cultists have contacted your secret artisans who toil in the forbidden workshops. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join in the attack. We could use their delusions to our advantage... If our enemy truly is mistaken, that is."

traits.locale_text: « Les cultistes ont contacté les artisans secrets qui œuvrent dans les ateliers interdits. Ces imbéciles espèrent qu'ils trahiront Votre Seigneurie et se joindront à eux lors de l'attaque. Nous pourrions exploiter leurs illusions délirantes à notre avantage... Si l'ennemi se trompe bel et bien, j'entends. »

languages.text: "Die Kultisten haben Eure geheimen Artifexe kontaktiert, die in den verbotenen Werkstätten arbeiten. Die Narren hoffen, dass sie Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} verraten und sich dem Angriff anschließen. Wir könnten ihre Wahnvorstellungen zu unserem Vorteil nutzen ... Falls unser Feind sich denn tatsächlich irrt."
languages.original_text: "The cultists have contacted your secret artisans who toil in the forbidden workshops. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join in the attack. We could use their delusions to our advantage... If our enemy truly is mistaken, that is."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kultisten haben Eure geheimen Artifexe kontaktiert, die in den verbotenen Werkstätten arbeiten. Die Narren hoffen, dass sie Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} verraten und sich dem Angriff anschließen. Wir könnten ihre Wahnvorstellungen zu unserem Vorteil nutzen ... Falls unser Feind sich denn tatsächlich irrt."

"Die Kultisten haben Eure geheimen Artifexe kontaktiert, die in den verbotenen Werkstätten arbeiten. Die Narren hoffen, dass sie Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} verraten und sich dem Angriff anschließen. Wir könnten ihre Torheit ausnutzen ... Falls unser Feind sich denn tatsächlich irrt."

languages.text: "Tarikatçılar, yasaklı atölyelerde çalışan gizli zanaatkârlarınızla iletişime geçmiş. Ahmaklar, zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne ihanet edip taarruza katılmalarını umuyorlar. Bu saflıklarını lehimize kullanabiliriz... Tabii, düşmanımız sahiden yanılıyorsa."
languages.original_text: "The cultists have contacted your secret artisans who toil in the forbidden workshops. The fools hope that they will betray Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and join in the attack. We could use their delusions to our advantage... If our enemy truly is mistaken, that is."

traits.locale_text: "Tarikatçılar, yasaklı atölyelerde çalışan gizli zanaatkârlarınızla iletişime geçmiş. Ahmaklar, zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne ihanet edip taarruza katılmalarını umuyorlar. Bu saflıklarını lehimize kullanabiliriz... Tabii, düşmanımız sahiden yanılıyorsa."
